game.title: Dreambuilder Game

long_description:
# You need to install some other mods!

This mod contains the API to add mobs into the world using one of the mods below:

- [Mobs Animal](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mobs_animal/)
- [Mobs Monster](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mobs_monster/)
- [Mobs NPC](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mobs_npc/)
- [Mob Horse](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mob_horse/)
- [Mobs Water](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mobs_water/)
- [Mese Monster Classic](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mob_mese_monster_classic)
- [Not So Simple Mobs](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/nssm/)
- [Not So Simple Mobs Extra](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/nssm_extra)
- [DMobs](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/dmobs/)
- [Slimes Redo](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mobs_slimes)
- [Goblins](https://content.minetest.net/packages/FreeLikeGNU/goblins)
- [Balrog](https://content.minetest.net/packages/rheo/mobs_balrog)
- [Wilhelmines Animal World](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Liil/animalworld)
- [Wilhelmines Marinara Mobs](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Liil/marinaramobs)
- [Wilhelmines Living Caves](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Liil/livingcavesmobs)
- [Wilhelmines Living Nether](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Liil/livingnether)
- [Wilhelmines Living Jungle](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Liil/livingjungle)
- [Wilhelmines Living Floatlands](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Liil/livingfloatlands)
- [Wilhelmines Living Desert](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Liil/livingdesert)
- [Flower Cow](https://content.minetest.net/packages/DrPlamsa/flower_cow)
- [MC Mobs](https://codeberg.org/tenplus1/mobs_mc)
- [Forgotten Monsters](https://content.minetest.net/packages/pixelzone/forgotten_monsters)
- [Ethereal Bosses](https://content.minetest.net/packages/pixelzone/ethereal_bosses)
- [Hardcoreti Mobs](https://content.luanti.org/packages/SamBas700/mobs_hardcoreti)
name: mobs
short_description: Simple and feature rich API to quickly add mobs into your world.
title: Mobs Redo API
